name: Universal Novacom Installer
tagline: This is a fork of the Universal Novacom installer from Jason Robitaille
body:
### Welcome to the Universal Novacom Installer.
If you're searching for older Versions (<1.4) please take a look at the original site:
http://code.google.com/p/universal-novacom-installer/

### Dependencies
You need at least Java >1.5 to use this installer.
If you don't have it installed already, head over to [Java.com](https://www.java.com/en/download/) and download the JRE.
In case you want to use this installer with Linux, also make sure the following packages are installed:
* xterm
* dpkg
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
